Guys, if some of you will get cyclical uPlay update, than you should:

 1. Replace uplay.exe it with cracked uPlay.exe - update it
 2. Replace back with original uPlay.exe - update it
 3. Raplace again with cracked uPlay.exe
 4. Then again follow instructions in txt file

If anyone has an issue where the game doesn't register in uPlay when hitting 'okay,' (you get an incorrect serial message) then it is because a previous crack was likely installed into the folder, and you need to uninstall uPlay and start from scratch. This worked for me at least.

If your having getting this error in uplay "unable to download uplay game files" you need to do those changes.

1- Open Uplay folder (normally: C/Program Files/Ubisoft/Ubisoft Game Launcher
2.- Press right click on uplay.exe 
3.- Press Properties
4.- In Properties normally you start at General, switch to Security
5.- You'll see two screens, one with the users and system and creator owner and other with the permission for the users
6.- Click edit then it will open a new window
7.- At the upper screen select your user and at the window below you will see a lot of options checked and unchecked
8,- Check the option with name Total Control at the allow part then press apply
9 - Relaunch Ac III and the error is gone !
